CustomField.description: If any of the following conditions are met: Priority is not "High" and not "Urgent" AND First_Response_Time__c is blank AND Age_hrs__c is greater than or equal to CMSLAResponseTimeReq_hrs__c. Priority is not "High" and not "Urgent" AND First_Response_Time__c is not blank AND CMSLAResponseTimeReq_hrs__c is less than Time_to_First_Response_hrs__c. Priority is "High" or "Urgent" AND (CMSLAResponseTimeReq_hrs__c is less than ((Recent_Response_Time__c - Recent_Inbound_Message__c) * 24)) OR (((Recent_Response_Time__c - Recent_Inbound_Message__c) * 24) * -1) is greater than CMSLAResponseTimeReq_hrs__c. Then, the result of the formula will be true; otherwise, it will be false.
CustomField.formula:
IF( OR(
AND( OR( NOT(ISPICKVAL(Priority, "High")),NOT(ISPICKVAL(Priority,"Urgent"))), ISBLANK(First_Response_Time__c) ,Age_hrs__c >= CMSLAResponseTimeReq_hrs__c),
AND( OR( NOT(ISPICKVAL(Priority, "High")),NOT(ISPICKVAL(Priority,"Urgent"))), NOT(ISBLANK(First_Response_Time__c)), CMSLAResponseTimeReq_hrs__c < Time_to_First_Response_hrs__c ),
AND( OR(ISPICKVAL(Priority, "High"),ISPICKVAL(Priority, "Urgent")), OR( CMSLAResponseTimeReq_hrs__c < ((Recent_Response_Time__c - Recent_Inbound_Message__c)*24), (((Recent_Response_Time__c - Recent_Inbound_Message__c)*24)*-1)>CMSLAResponseTimeReq_hrs__c))
), True ,False )
CustomField.label: CM SLA BREACH
